init_vault_fail: Failed to initialize vault. Please check URL of Credential Store and Vault Server.
init_vault_bad_request: Failed to initialize vault. Please check parameters: shares should be positive integer; threshold should be integer equal to or less than shares. If shares > 1 then threshold must be larger than 1.
vault_not_initialized: Failed to unseal the vault. Please check that the vault is initialized.
secret_not_exist: The requested secret does not exist. Please check secret name.
